categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: A Human woman was a Sith of the reconstituted Sith Empire and the mother of Kira Carsen. She and her husband had their child on the Empire's capital of Dromund Kaas, but as a young child Carsen was taken by the servants of the Sith Emperor to become one of the Children of the Emperor.
